name: torchlight-tracker-electron
description: Torchlight Infinite Price Tracker - Electron Edition
author: Hye Kim

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5174 && npm run build:electron-dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.build: npm run build:vite && npm run build:electron-main
scripts.build:win-portable: npm run build && electron-builder --win portable --config electron-builder.json
scripts.release: npm run build && electron-builder --publish always --config electron-builder.json
